detail_desc: Thin metal chain necklace with a ring pendant. Adjustable length, 40-46 cm.
Hair elastics with a knot. Width 1.5 cm.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets with buttons, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated smocking at the hems.

Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with appliqués on the front and flounced sleeves that continue down the sides. Shorts with a decorative bow at the front, an elasticated waist with a small frill trim at the top and diagonal side pockets.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with seams down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Tailored trousers woven in a stretch cotton blend with a concealed zip in the side and fake back pocket. Straight tapered legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
Short, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket, high-waisted trousers in stretch twill with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with long sleeves.
Long-sleeved body in lace with a V-neck, mesh side sections and press-studs at the crotch. Lined bust.
T-shirt in sturdy, printed jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes along the short sides. Size 32x180 cm.
Pull-on trousers in a textured weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Gently tapered legs with short slits at the hems.

Sleeveless romper suit in an airy viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top and elastication at the back. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and covered elastication at the hems.
Sun hat in a soft cotton weave with ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 4 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Top in soft terry with a print motif on the front and buttons at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Off-the-shoulder top in a stretch weave with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Calf-length dress in a patterned viscose weave with buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and an asymmetric skirt. Unlined.
Shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles at the top, a wide tab with a magnetic fastener and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 15.5x32x35.5 cm.
Lined triangle bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastening at the back.
Wide blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with a gathered grandad collar and buttons at the front. Dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a wide, foldover panel at the waist for a more comfortable fit.

Softshell jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, fleece-lined hood, zip with a chin guard at the front, side pockets, reflective details, ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Long shirt in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long sleeves with wide cuffs with a slit. Seam with an asymmetric flounce at the hem and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, lightly padded cups, a seam at the waist and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, double, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.

Sports joggers in jersey made from a cotton blend with taped details. Elasticated waist, a slightly lower crotch with a ventilating mesh section, and zipped side pockets for safe storage of small items.

Short-sleeved top in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood with a concealed drawstring that tightens to the back. Zipped chest pocket with a reflective detail, short raglan sleeves, slits at the hem and reflective details on the front and sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
A pair of thin metal hoop earrings with a rhinestone-decorated pendant.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Baby Exclusive. Small comfort blanket in double-weave organic cotton with a padded, heart-shaped appliqué at one edge. Size 19x19 cm.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with seamless quilting to provide extra protection from cold air. Lined hood with an elasticated drawstring and a zip with a chin guard. Zipped front pockets and one zipped inner pocket. Concealed elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in soft wool. Size 90x210 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Cold shoulder dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, short, elasticated sleeves with a small frill trim at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with covered elastication at the waist and a small fringed trim at the hem.
Thin, jacquard-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.

Pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Small backpack with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable shoulder straps. Size 11x21x26 cm.
Metal bangle with skulls at each end.
Top in an airy weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and gathered seams to create added volume and soft draping.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge, pile-lined tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a hook and loop tab at the top. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Mules in imitation suede with pointed toes and a decorative strap over the foot with sparkly stones. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Thin metal rings in various designs.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Slides in imitation suede with crossover straps. Imitation suede insoles and fluted soles.
Sunglasses with transparent plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Trousers in stretch twill with detachable braces. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, side pockets and fake back pockets. Adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft, superstretch denim with a drawstring waist, zip fly and press-stud and slim legs with flap leg pockets.
Sandals with an adjustable hook and loop fastener at the heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and wide, tapered legs.

A-line dress in tulle with an opening and a shimmering button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication, and gathered tiers on the skirt that create movement. Lined.
Block-coloured swimsuit with a small stand-up collar, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and short legs. Zip with a zip guard at the back. UPF 50.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved, polo-neck tops in organic cotton jersey.
Double-layered headband knitted in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover detail at the front.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fine-knit trainer socks with an embroidered motif and elasticated tops.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a button fly, short slit at the front and cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit cargo trousers in cotton twill with a zip fly and press-stud and tapered legs with decorative stitching. Flap side pockets and leg pockets, and fake flap pockets at the back.
Sandals with adjustable foot straps and a loop at the back. Moulded thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles, fluted underneath.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and flared legs.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with sequined embroidery and a round neck. Buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with a collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pockets, patch front pockets and an open back pocket. Elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs.
Hat in a soft rib knit with decorative sparkly-stone appliqués.

Cardigan and a pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Patterned cardigan with press-studs down the front and long sleeves. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Felted wool beret. Unlined.
